mutator_cloaker_arrest_desc: Cuffed when kicked by a Cloaker.
mutator_dozer_rage_desc: 100% damage increase when a Bulldozer's faceplate is destroyed.
mutator_heavies_longdesc: Every light police unit is replaced by heavy police unit.
mutator_medic_adrenaline_desc: Whenever a cop is revived by Medic, that enemy gets an increase in their damage output.
mutator_medic_deathwish_desc: All enemies are healed upon Medic's death.
mutator_medic_dozer_desc: Medic Dozers are allowed into the level.
mutator_medic_rage_desc: Whenever a Medic revives another cop, Medic's base damage is increased.
mutator_minigun_dozer_desc: Minigun Dozers are allowed into the level.
mutator_more_dozers_activated: $amount additional Bulldozers are allowed into the level.
mutator_more_medics_activated: $amount additional Medics are allowed into the level.
mutator_shield_phalanx_desc: Every shield is replaced by Winter's shield.
mutator_skulldozer_desc: Skulldozers are allowed into the level.
mutator_taser_overcharge_desc: Faster knockout effect from a Taser.
